channel.title: AmericanGamerZ, Vps Need Programmers
channel.description:
[ul]Well, I recently purchased a VPS [URL=http://www.speedtest.net][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1273225350.png[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1zlu2b5.png[/img] Very good specs aswell, and I need a good (317) source along with a coder to go with it. VPS's ram will be upgraded when needed. [B]You will be getting a staff position in the server, BUT if you in any way abuse it or act immature you will no longer be part of the server we will maintain it from there on out.[/B] We have different type of payments for whoever steps up and takes the roll. [list] [li][color=red]0/2 Coders[/li][/list] [list][li][color=red]0/1 Client Coder[/li][/list] You will NOT have access to the VPS untill I can trust you. We don't want a "fake" coder that goes and just changes the names of a source to ours, we could do that ourselves we want someone that knows wtf they are doing. We also have a second VPS that will be hosting a "GunZ the Duel" private server on it. Contact me, Skype: caleb.panic P.S, We currently already have our own domain name being hosted. Both our VPS's are bought in advance for 3 months. Our Domain + hosting is bought for 6 months in advance. We have gotten a few bites on this on other sites related to RSPS's but no one followed through with what I wanted, They just couldn't handle it. Here is the file I uploaded to other RSPS websites telling them some of the stuff I'll want.
For Commands. Players ::commands - Show all our commands, Does NOT show mod+ commands. They can find them on the forums. ::home - Back to home area ::train - Training Area (Make it sexy as hell:) ) ::kqueen - K queen, Drop good stuff. ::pk - Where you can PK (Hopefully perfect:) ) ::funpk - Fun pk, Do not lose items ::skiller - Skiller area ::jad - Jad. - Drops good stuff. ::fish - Fishing ( can be added in skiller area ) ::shops - Shoping area (MALL) ::Rules - Opens a list of the server rules, I will give them to you soon. Need to be written ::players - Shows how many players online, (Doesn't give a list just a number) ::barrows - Get barrows here """::donorarea - Donator area, Can get donator gear here, I'll leave that to you to make the donor gear, It MUST not be tradable and not too pro, just a little better. ^^^^^^ Cannot be reachable by people that are not donors Add walls do something. Mods ::ban - Account ban ::mute - Mute account ::ipmute - Mutes IP from talking ::kick - kicks player ::modzone - Has donor gear, No admin gear or anything. Admins ::pickup - add item to invo ::pnpc - Morph? ::npc - Spawn NPC ::invis - Makes admin invisible to other players Owners ::ipban - Bans IP ::god - Godmode? Information you should know. I want a very good economy, I don't want people getting stuff very easily But I don't want it to be super hard either. I want it to be pretty based on Pking, but also add a twist with some quests and monsters to kill for gear. Also a PK Point system, After a certain amount of kills you can gain better gear. Server must be stable enough to maintain 100+ players at a time. AntiNull, AntiSYI. Remember, I have a 24/7 Pro VPS. ^You will be getting a part of our donations once we get enough to host our 2 vps's and website without troubles. MODS.(iMPORTANT) I don't want them to be above the normal player. They are only going to be there to maintain gameplay, They are not going to have any gear above a donator. Mods tend to think they are all powerful.;) Extra Features. I'll want HiScores and eventually some sort of black market ran from the website. ^I can do this if you cannot or simply don't want too. VPS Info You will get this in time. My trust has to be gained. I've had bad experience with some people. You probably understand:) The name of the server will be AmericanScape < There is a reason to our madness. (Will say it below) Anymore questions just ask me and i'll let you know, This is all I can think of at the moment. OH, if you want to add anything else in here, just let me know and i'll give you the okay on it:) All suggestions are welcome Thanks:) Skype: caleb.panic Our name reasoning. While we are hosting a RSPS we are also hosting a GunZ the Duel server, Most GunZ servers are called something along the lines of "Euro-Gunz" etc. We decided to change it up a bit and make it AmericanGunZ.
Thanks, Caleb[/ul] Just an FYI. I don't want admins / mods right now. DONT ASK.

item.title: AmericanGamerZ, Vps Need Programmers
item.dc:creator: @panic2 panic2
item.description:
@panic2 wrote:

I didn’t even mean to buy the rsps vps. We were not planning on hosting a RSPS. But I accidentally bought 2 and they were so cheap at the time I didn’t really care.

Anyway, Only post if you are wanted to be a developer for AmericanScape, Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: AmericanGamerZ, Vps Need Programmers
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:14, topic:393640”][quote author=Spencer4678 link=topic=490810.msg3590372#msg3590372 date=1304568236]

Heh, a windows VPS

Nothing wrong with a Windows VPS, it’s only a RSPS lol…
[/quote]That is where you are mistaken[/quote]
Windows VPS:
“Alright, moved my files over, that took forever, might as well play some minesweeper while I test it. some time later Damn, made a mistake. Guess I’ll just install eclipse on here so I don’t have to switch back and forth. some time later ugh, now my client wont connect. I’ll just download a client and the cache to test it here. some more time later OMG stupid vps, what do you mean ‘OutOfMemoryException’??? I only have the client, minesweeper, eclipse, and the server running -.-”

Linux VPS:

git checkout <git url>
java path/to/main
logout

Read full topic

item.title: AmericanGamerZ, Vps Need Programmers
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:11, topic:393640”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=490810.msg3590286#msg3590286 date=1304561190]
Why would you buy a VPS 3 months in advance with a partially coded server?
[/quote]
I personally do that for BETA and setting up sql, I am not sure about him though.[/quote]

I would host the alpha/beta/etc on my local machine, usually creating a separate partition on my HDD and set up the SQL there, instead of paying X dollars with no income.

Read full topic

item.title: AmericanGamerZ, Vps Need Programmers
item.dc:creator: @panic2 panic2
item.description:
@panic2 wrote:

[ul]Well, I recently purchased a VPS


Very good specs aswell, and I need a good (317) source along with a coder to go with it. VPS’s ram will be upgraded when needed.

You will be getting a staff position in the server, BUT if you in any way abuse it or act immature you will no longer be part of the server we will maintain it from there on out.

We have different type of payments for whoever steps up and takes the roll.

[list]
[li][color=red]0/2 Coders[/li][/list]
[list][li][color=red]0/1 Client Coder[/li][/list]

You will NOT have access to the VPS untill I can trust you.

We don’t want a “fake” coder that goes and just changes the names of a source to ours, we could do that ourselves we want someone that knows wtf they are doing.

We also have a second VPS that will be hosting a “GunZ the Duel” private server on it.

Contact me,

Skype: caleb.panic

P.S, We currently already have our own domain name being hosted.

Both our VPS’s are bought in advance for 3 months.
Our Domain + hosting is bought for 6 months in advance.

We have gotten a few bites on this on other sites related to RSPS’s but no one followed through with what I wanted, They just couldn’t handle it.

Here is the file I uploaded to other RSPS websites telling them some of the stuff I’ll want.

For Commands.

Players
::commands - Show all our commands, Does NOT show mod+ commands. They can find them on the forums.
::home - Back to home area
::train - Training Area (Make it sexy as hell:) )
::kqueen - K queen, Drop good stuff.
::pk - Where you can PK (Hopefully perfect:) )
::funpk - Fun pk, Do not lose items
::skiller - Skiller area
::jad - Jad. - Drops good stuff.
::fish - Fishing ( can be added in skiller area )
::shops - Shoping area (MALL)
::Rules - Opens a list of the server rules, I will give them to you soon. Need to be written
::players - Shows how many players online, (Doesn’t give a list just a number)
::barrows - Get barrows here

“”"::donorarea - Donator area, Can get donator gear here, I’ll leave that to you to make the donor gear, It MUST not be tradable and not too pro, just a little better.
^^^^^^ Cannot be reachable by people that are not donors Add walls do something.

Mods
::ban - Account ban
::mute - Mute account
::ipmute - Mutes IP from talking
::kick - kicks player
::modzone - Has donor gear, No admin gear or anything.

Admins
::pickup - add item to invo
::pnpc - Morph?
::npc - Spawn NPC
::invis - Makes admin invisible to other players

Owners
::ipban - Bans IP
::god - Godmode?

Information you should know.

I want a very good economy, I don’t want people getting stuff very easily
But I don’t want it to be super hard either. I want it to be pretty based on
Pking, but also add a twist with some quests and monsters to kill for gear.

Also a PK Point system, After a certain amount of kills you can gain better gear.

Server must be stable enough to maintain 100+ players at a time. AntiNull, AntiSYI.
Remember, I have a 24/7 Pro VPS.
^You will be getting a part of our donations once we get enough to host our 2 vps’s and website without troubles.

MODS.(iMPORTANT)
I don’t want them to be above the normal player. They are only going to be there
to maintain gameplay, They are not going to have any gear above a donator.
Mods tend to think they are all powerful.

Extra Features.

I’ll want HiScores and eventually some sort of black market ran from the website.
^I can do this if you cannot or simply don’t want too.

VPS Info
You will get this in time. My trust has to be gained. I’ve had bad experience
with some people. You probably understand:)

The name of the server will be AmericanScape < There is a reason to our madness. (Will say it below)

Anymore questions just ask me and i’ll let you know, This is all I can think of at the moment.

OH, if you want to add anything else in here, just let me know and i’ll give you
the okay on it:) All suggestions are welcome
Thanks:)

Skype: caleb.panic

Our name reasoning.
While we are hosting a RSPS we are also hosting a GunZ the Duel server, Most GunZ servers are called something along the lines of “Euro-Gunz” etc. We decided to change it up a bit and make it AmericanGunZ.

Thanks,
Caleb[/ul]

Just an FYI.
I don’t want admins / mods right now.
DONT ASK.

Read full topic
